DataElement.preferredName: Colorectal Surgical Procedure Attempt Incomplete Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to specify the reason an intended diagnostic or treatment procedure involving the colon, rectum, or bowel performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue, not being completed or finished.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to an intended diagnostic or treatment procedure involving the colon, rectum, or bowel performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue, not being completed or finished.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (ko-lo-REK-tul) Having to do with the colon or the rectum.:Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the colon and rectum, or to the entire large bowel.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure".:Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.

Concepts.definition: An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure".
Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
